text: Platycorynus cribratellus is a species of leaf beetle. It is distributed in Uganda, Kenya, Ethiopia, southern Sudan, the Central African Republic and the Democratic Republic of the Congo. It was described by Léon Fairmaire in 1885. ==References== Category:Eumolpinae Category:Beetles of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Taxa named by Léon Fairmaire Category:Beetles described in 1885
title: Platycorynus cribratellus
